label: 六波羅探題
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
見出し読み: ろくはら たんだい
説明文: Post established after 1221, whereby two Kamakura deputies resided in the capital, overseeing its affairs, and engaging in preliminary judicial decisions, primarily for western Japan. Rokuhara was a region located in eastern Kyoto. The last tandai were killed in 1333 shortly after they fled the capital.
